title: CAREER
intro:
To make products come alive – this is our claim and our strength:

The Berlin-based Zuumeo GmbH ranks as one of Germany’s leading content providers. Well-known e-commerce customers such as Zalando, About You and Galeria Kaufhof rely on our professional product photography and our additional content services. As a growing company in the dynamic environment of e-commerce we are looking for qualified and motivated colleagues who wish to shape the future of online trading together we us.

Currently we are looking for:
initiativ: Please send unsolicited applications to personal@zuumeo.com.
